title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.65 - Location of mobile refueling stations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.65 - Location of mobile refueling stations

State Regulations

Mobile refueling stations shall not be located within
50 feet of any structure, other tank vehicles or aircraft while refueling
operations are in progress. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1262.65

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
